job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates a role focused on building and maintaining the server-side of software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: building the next generation of research capabilities
job_tasks.justification: Implies the development of new features and systems for users.

job_tasks.phrase: better integrate the system into the user's daily workflow
job_tasks.justification: This points to the development and integration of software features to improve user experience and functionality.
This is a core software development activity focused on maintaining and enhancing existing code.

job_tasks.phrase: improve the quality of the system
job_tasks.justification: While broad, in the context of an AI product, improving quality often involves model enhancements.

job_tasks.phrase: enabling the use of internal documents of our customers
job_tasks.justification: This task, in the context of GenAI, strongly suggests the implementation of RAG systems or similar techniques to process and utilize external data within models.

job_tasks.phrase: help to set up a case-builder
job_tasks.justification: A 'case-builder' likely involves generating content or structuring information, which points to generative AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: experiments to enhance the product with machine learning models
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to the process of creating, training, or adapting ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: machine learning models (both open-source and GPT)
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions the use and potential modification of machine learning models, including GPT.

job_tasks.phrase: use of internal documents of our customers
job_tasks.justification: Handling and enabling the use of customer documents implies data processing and preparation, which falls under data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Generative AI is rapidly changing the legal sector.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase demonstrates an understanding of the business domain and the impact of AI within it.

job_tasks.phrase: opportunities to make the work of lawyers and tax specialists more efficient and enjoyable.
job_tasks.justification: This shows an understanding of the business value and user needs that the AI product aims to address.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and improving a product (GenIA-L) that leverages Generative AI, specifically mentioning GPT and machine learning models. Key responsibilities include integrating customer documents (suggesting RAG) and developing a 'case-builder', alongside core back-end development tasks. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer.
